name: Ghost Ship
description: Ghost Ship is an indica-dominant cross between Purple Kush Starship and Gupta Kush created by Colorado Seed Inc. Pervasive relaxation cascades over the body, but the buzz is not lethargic. With a very strong aroma that can only be described as “Kushy,” this strain soothes aches and pains while lending heady introspection. Think hard and rest easy. This flower is a solid option for muscle relaxation and stress relief.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Euphoric, Tingly, Insomnia, Pain, Stress, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid
